definition.name: Setup Clojure
definition.description: Setup your runner with Clojure build tools
definition.author: DeLaGuardo

inputs.name: lein
inputs.description: The Leiningen version to make available on the path.

inputs.name: boot
inputs.description: The boot-clj version to make available on the path.

inputs.name: tools-deps
inputs.description: [DEPRECATED] The tools deps version to make available on the path.

inputs.name: cli
inputs.description: Clojure CLI version to make available on the path.

inputs.name: cmd-exe-workaround
inputs.description:
[DEPRECATED] On Windows platform, it will replace official Clojure CLI with the `deps.clj` of its specific version, `latest` can be used.
Useful for running `clojure` command from `cmd.exe`.

inputs.name: bb
inputs.description: Babashka version to install, `latest` can be used.

inputs.name: clj-kondo
inputs.description: Clj-kondo version to install, `latest` can be used.

inputs.name: cljfmt
inputs.description: cljfmt version to install, `latest` can be used.

inputs.name: cljstyle
inputs.description: cljstyle version to install, `latest` can be used.

inputs.name: zprint
inputs.description: zprint version to install, `latest` can be used.

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: To fix rate limit errors, provide `secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN` value to this field. More info: https://docs.github.com/en/actions/security-guides/automatic-token-authentication

inputs.name: invalidate-cache
inputs.description: Set to `true` to fix problems related to wrongly populated tool cache
